name: Candy factory-clicker
description:
Candy factory is a place to click on the game, at first you almost nothing: the old office, rickety on the table.

By clicking on the screen, you can produce processed candies and slowly increase your wealth. Spend the dough to upgrade

terrible furniture to something like an entertainment center and priceless artwork. If you are smart (it is, you are!), You will

spend some money investing to help you make money.


feature:
No purchase
No ads
Build your own candy kingdom~~~~~~
